products.desc: FEJKA artificial potted plants that don’t require a green thumb. Perfect when you have better things to do than water plants and tidy up dead leaves. You’ll have everyone fooled because they look so lifelike.
This plant humidifies air and suits offices or homes with dry air. It’s sometimes called a butterfly palm due to the shape of the leaves and can boost your well-being and make the room more vibrant.
When the leaves droop on this easy-care plant, it’s trying to tell you that it needs water. Easy to understand – and it can also boost your well-being and make the home more vibrant.
Decorate your home with plants combined with a plant pot to suit your style.
